SmartWatches That Detect Physical Struggles

About Us

Our smartwatches help detect signs of physical distress, ensuring you stay safe and informed. But we go beyond just monitoring our devices are designed to respond in real-time, alerting emergency contacts, syncing vital data with healthcare providers, and adapting to your personal health profile.

We believe that technology should empower you to live freely, confidently, and longer. Whether you're managing chronic conditions, monitoring recovery, or simply striving for a healthier lifestyle, CodVeda-Health delivers intelligent insights at your wrist anytime, anywhere.

From urban professionals to rural seniors, we’re building the bridge between safety and independence.
